scenes.description: 画面淡入,展现云雾缭绕的仙域上空,金色卷轴在空中展开,光芒闪动,背景音乐渐起。

visual.composition: Misty immortal skies with a golden scroll unfurling
visual.environment: Immortal realm sky filled with swirling clouds and golden light
visual.fx: Golden radiance and unfolding scroll effect

scenes.prompt: Xianxia opening, mist-wreathed immortal sky with a golden scroll unfurling, spiritual particles drifting, wide shot, cinematic lighting, 4K
scenes.narration: 我是云卷仙音,欢迎回来。第26集:天心丹·交易完成。

scenes.description: 吕师妹略一犹豫后,纤手一翻转,手中多出一碧绿瓷瓶,冷静地说道:'我用一瓶天心丹和道友换下银芯石怎么样?'

visual.composition: Miss Lü hesitates slightly, flips delicate hand, produces jade-green porcelain bottle, calmly says: 'What if I exchange a bottle of Heavenly Heart Pill for Silver Core Stone?'

scenes.prompt: Miss Lü hesitates slightly, flips delicate hand, produces jade-green porcelain bottle, calmly says: 'What if I exchange a bottle of Heavenly Heart Pill for Silver Core Stone?'
scenes.narration: 吕师妹略一犹豫后，纤手一翻转，手中多出一碧绿瓷瓶，冷静地说道:'我用一瓶天心丹和道友换下银芯石怎么样?'

scenes.description: 吕师妹解释道天心丹可以让神念临时增长,弥补炼体士神念不足的缺陷,在突破瓶颈时大有好处。

visual.composition: Miss Lü explains Heavenly Heart Pill can temporarily increase spirit sense, compensate body cultivator's spirit sense deficiency, very helpful for breaking bottlenecks

scenes.prompt: Miss Lü explains Heavenly Heart Pill can temporarily increase spirit sense, compensate body cultivator's spirit sense deficiency, very helpful for breaking bottlenecks.
scenes.narration: 吕师妹解释道天心丹可以让神念临时增长，弥补炼体士神念不足，在突破瓶颈时大有好处。

scenes.description: 钱师兄见到此幕,立刻大惊阻止道:'天心丹?吕师妹这可是黄粱前辈的独门秘药,换取这么区区一块银芯石,太浪费了。'

visual.composition: Senior Brother Qian sees this, shocked, tries to stop: 'Heavenly Heart Pill? Miss Lü, this is Huangliang Spirit Lord's unique secret medicine, too wasteful for mere Silver Core Stone!'
visual.character_pose: Young man shocked, trying to stop

scenes.prompt: Senior Brother Qian sees this, shocked, tries to stop: 'Heavenly Heart Pill? Miss Lü, this is Huangliang Spirit Lord's unique secret medicine, too wasteful for mere Silver Core Stone!'
scenes.narration: 钱师兄见到此幕，立刻大惊阻止道:'天心丹?吕师妹这可是黄粱前辈的独门秘药，太浪费了。'

scenes.description: 胥老闻言也有些动容,田兴却似乎从未听过此丹药名字,有些茫然的样子。

visual.composition: Xu Lao also moved by mention, Tian Xing seems never heard of this pill name, looks confused
visual.character_pose: Old man impressed, Tian Xing confused

scenes.prompt: Xu Lao also moved by mention, Tian Xing seems never heard of this pill name, looks confused.
scenes.narration: 胥老闻言也有些动容,田兴却似乎从未听过此丹药名字,有些茫然的样子。

scenes.description: 韩立心中一动,脱口问道:'临时增加神念,对修士也有作用吗?'

visual.composition: Han Li's heart moves, asks suddenly: 'Temporarily increase spirit sense, does it work for cultivators too?'

scenes.prompt: Han Li's heart moves, asks suddenly: 'Temporarily increase spirit sense, does it work for cultivators too?'
scenes.narration: 韩立心中一动,脱口问道:'临时增加神念,对修士也有作用吗?'

scenes.description: 吕师妹闻言有些意外,略微不解地回道:'修士原本的神念就够强大,效果自然微乎其微了。'

visual.composition: Miss Lü somewhat surprised by question, slightly puzzled replies: 'Cultivators' spirit sense is already strong enough, effect naturally minimal.'

scenes.prompt: Miss Lü somewhat surprised by question, slightly puzzled replies: 'Cultivators' spirit sense is already strong enough, effect naturally minimal.'
scenes.narration: 吕师妹闻言有些意外,略微不解地回道:'修士原本的神念就够强大,效果自然微乎其微了。'

scenes.description: 韩立还是摇摇头,平静说道:'若是这样的话,吕道友收起此瓶吧,在下不会交换的。'

visual.composition: Han Li still shakes head, calmly says: 'If so, Miss Lü, put away the bottle, I won't exchange.'

scenes.prompt: Han Li still shakes head, calmly says: 'If so, Miss Lü, put away the bottle, I won't exchange.'
scenes.narration: 韩立还是摇摇头,平静说道:'若是这样的话,吕道友收起此瓶吧,在下不会交换的。'

scenes.description: 这次吕师妹的面色也有些难看了,胥老则一脸的愕然,不敢相信韩立会为了一块灵具材料拒绝这等好处。

visual.composition: This time Miss Lü's face also darkens, Xu Lao looks astonished, can't believe Han Li would reject such benefit for mere artifact material

scenes.prompt: This time Miss Lü's face also darkens, Xu Lao looks astonished, can't believe Han Li would reject such benefit for mere artifact material.
scenes.narration: 这次吕师妹的面色也有些难看了,胥老则一脸的愕然,不敢相信韩立会为了一块灵具材料拒绝这等好处。

scenes.description: 就在老者惊疑之际,韩立却已经淡淡地询问起两件东西的价格来。

visual.composition: While old man is still shocked, Han Li already calmly asks about prices of two items

scenes.prompt: While old man is still shocked, Han Li already calmly asks about prices of two items.
scenes.narration: 就在老者惊疑之际,韩立却已经淡淡地询问起两件东西的价格来。

scenes.description: 胥老心有忌惮之下,倒也没有狮子大开口,但仍然说出了一个对普通修士来说仍是天价的数目。

visual.composition: Xu Lao, being cautious, doesn't overprice, but still names a price that's astronomical for ordinary cultivators

scenes.prompt: Xu Lao, being cautious, doesn't overprice, but still names a price that's astronomical for ordinary cultivators.
scenes.narration: 胥老心有忌惮之下,倒也没有狮子大开口,但仍然说出了一个对普通修士来说仍是天价的数目。

scenes.description: 韩立听了点点头,手掌一翻转,多出了一枚储物镯出来。

visual.composition: Han Li nods after hearing, flips palm, produces a storage bracelet

scenes.prompt: Han Li nods after hearing, flips palm, produces a storage bracelet.
scenes.narration: 韩立听了点点头,手掌一翻转,多出了一枚储物镯出来。

scenes.description: 韩立另一只手上的灵戒在镯上只是一划,一堆高阶灵石掉了出来,足够付两件物品绰绰有余了。

visual.composition: Han Li's spirit ring on other hand just touches bracelet, pile of high-grade spirit stones falls out, more than enough for both items

scenes.description: 胥老二话不说,同样用手上的储物镯将灵石一收,这场交易就算完成了。

visual.composition: Xu Lao says nothing, uses storage bracelet to collect spirit stones, transaction completed

scenes.narration: 胥老二话不说,同样用手上的储物镯将灵石一收,这场交易就算完成了。

scenes.description: 韩立将锦盒一收,就直接冲门外而去,田兴也心惊胆战之下,急忙跟了出去。

visual.composition: Han Li puts away boxes, directly heads toward door, Tian Xing, terrified, hurriedly follows

scenes.description: 钱师兄面色阴晴了好一会儿,在心中拿不定韩立真实身份之前,没有阻拦韩立的离去。

visual.composition: Senior Brother Qian's face changes color for a while, before determining Han Li's true identity, doesn't stop Han Li from leaving

scenes.prompt: Senior Brother Qian's face changes color for a while, before determining Han Li's true identity, doesn't stop Han Li from leaving.

scenes.description: 钱师兄心中暗暗决定,回去后就马上派人调查这人的身份,看看对方到底什么来历。

visual.composition: Senior Brother Qian secretly decides to send people to investigate this person's identity after returning, see what background he has

scenes.description: 吕师妹注视着韩立的背影,嘴唇微咬了一下,心中同样觉得郁闷异常。

visual.composition: Miss Lü watches Han Li's back, bites lip slightly, feels extremely frustrated

scenes.prompt: Miss Lü watches Han Li's back, bites lip slightly, feels extremely frustrated.

scenes.description: 走到店铺外的韩立,心情却很不错,对到手的两种材料非常的满意。

visual.composition: Han Li outside shop, mood very good, very satisfied with obtained materials

visual.composition: Actually between the two materials, the gray stone is more valuable, because it's a variant material of artifact material, extremely rare

scenes.description: 要不是韩立曾在虞阳城中将藏书看了个七七八八,恐怕还无法想起此物,但对韩立这个异类来说,这种材料却是妙用无穷。

visual.composition: If not for Han Li reading most books in Yu Yang City, might not remember this item, but for someone like Han Li, this material has endless uses

scenes.narration: 下一集再见。我是云卷仙音,原著作者忘语。第27集即将开始。
